name: Charlie Chimp and the Treasure of Tutankhamun
overview: A platform adventure game made by Brian Bell and published exclusively made for Amiga Format Issue #87 (Aug 1996). Can you help Charlie Chimp solve the many puzzles ahead of him and find the famous Egyptian Pharoh? You must travel around the game area collecting any objects that you think may be useful in your quest. You will met many different characters throughout your journey and it may be necessary to communicate and be friendly with them in order to complete the game.Press the fire button to interact with an object or character. Created using the Ultimate Software Construction Kit.
